participant_1.background:
I have a secret bank account that I use to buy things that my parents would disapprove of.
My first job was working in my family's restaurant.
i like classical music.
i work full time.
I enjoy a great time at the Comic Con with my husband.

participant_2.background:
After a long day of creating websites, I like to go for a run to clear my head.
I watch Rick and Morty when my parents are not home because they don't approve of it.
I remember feeling safe and loved when my mom would take me to the park.
I enjoy spending time with my family as they help me stay grounded and connected to my roots.
I love spending time with my pets and they bring me so much joy.

content.text: Hi there! How are you today?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking! How about yourself?
I'm doing great! I just got back from Comic Con with my husband. We had a lot of fun.
That sounds awesome! I've always wanted to go to Comic Con, but I've never had the chance.
It's definitely worth it if you're a fan of comics or pop culture.
I'm a big fan of both, so I'm sure I would love it.
Well, you should definitely try to go sometime!
I will! Thanks for the recommendation.
No problem! So, what do you do for a living?
I'm a web developer. I create websites for businesses.
That sounds really interesting! Do you enjoy it?
I do! It's a lot of fun to be able to create something from scratch and see it come to life.
That's awesome! I'm glad you enjoy your job.
Thanks! I'm pretty lucky to have found something I love to do.
Me too! So, what do you like to do for fun?
I love to go for runs, watch Rick and Morty, and spend time with my family and pets.
Sounds like you have a lot of fun hobbies! I love Rick and Morty too.
It's such a good show! I'm glad you enjoy it.
Me too! So, what are your pets like?
I have a dog and a cat. The dog is a golden retriever named Bailey, and the cat is a tabby named Mittens.
They sound adorable! I love animals.
They are! They're both my best friends.
That's great! I'm glad you have such great pets.
Thanks! I am too.
Well, it was nice talking to you! I hope you have a great day.
You too! It was nice talking to you too.
